title: In case I get selected
body:
I'm just wondering, in case i get selected for the alpha, is everything 1 IP like on the PBE or is it reflective of my normal account? Like, are the IP/RP amounts the same as on my normal account or not? Because I'm curious just in case I get selected for the alpha testing.
I'm sorry that this wasn't about bugs or suggestions I just didn't know where to ask.{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
If you're talking about what your IP and RP figures are shown as, it's the same as the Legacy client

If you're talking about how much IP you earn from a game, it's the same as the Legacy Client

Purchasing RP, and Spending IP and RP are not currently available in the Alpha Client we are testing.
